description: When it comes to casting, arguably no role in the world garners more attention than that of James Bond. Connery, Brosnan, Craig, each of us has our favourite version of the iconic British spy. Now, following a period of (now confirmed to be successful) internet sleuth work, we have a new face to add to the canon: Patrick Gibson.

description: A short time into developing 007 First Light, something happened that meant parts of James Bond’s next adventure needed to be rewritten. No, it wasn’t anything going down internally at the studio that led to such a change, but something entirely more global: the death of Queen Elizabeth II of England.
title: 'It Was Fairly Small, It Did Feel Significant' — How the Death of the Queen Forced IO to Tweak 007 First Light

description: Both GTA 6 and Hollow Knight: Silksong have prompted plenty of discussion this year about what developers can and should do when their game suddenly shares a release date with a juggernaut. So IGN asked the experts about the thought process behind setting and moving release dates, and what they think the right choice is when GTA 6, Silksong, or another marketing monster drops into your launch window unexpectedly.
title: Why Hollow Knight: Silksong Is This Year's GTA 6, and Whether a Juggernaut Stomping on Your Release Date Really Matters
